11 Resep makanan unik, simpel, kreatif, dan menggugah selera
Makanan unik yang bisa kamu olah di rumah.
07 Nov 2019, 14:05 by Lola Lolita
Saat ini sangat mudah menjumpai berbagai macam jenis makanan unik. Berkreasi dalam urusan masak, mencampurkan bahan baru, atau memodifikasi cara memasak inilah yang kemudian membuat bisnis dunia kuliner ramai peminat.
Kita bisa melihat berapa banyak pedagang kaki lima yang menjajakan makanan unik dengan berbagai jenis rasa dan warna. Namun mengandalkan keunikan saja tidak cukup, tentunya harus didukung dengan cita rasa yamg enak pula.
Jika kamu ingin mencoba berbisnis kuliler dan usahamu dilirik oleh banyak orang, kamu harus mencari sesuatu yang unik. Namun jika kamu hanya sekadar ingin mencoba membuat sendiri beberapa makanan unik yang pernah kamu jumpai, bisa banget kok.
Berikut beberapa resep makanan unik yang bisa kamu buat sendiri di rumah, seperti yang dilansir brilio.net dari berbagai sumber, Kamis (7/11).

1. Mi gulung sosis.



Instagram/@resepdapurr

Bahan-bahan:- 3 buah sosis sapi atau sosis ayam, dipotong menjadi 3 bagian- 1 bungkus mi instan- 1 butir telur ayam- 1/4 sendok teh garam- 1/4 sendok teh penyadap rasa- 1 siung bawang putih, haluskan- 2 butir bawang merah, haluskan- air untuk merebus secukupnya secukupnya
Bahan Pelengkap:- saus sambal cocol
Cara membuat:- Rebus mi instan dalam air mendidih sampai lunak, angkat tiriskan- Setelah itu, campurkan mi yang sudah direbus dengan bumbu yang dihaluskan dengan garam dan penyedap rasa, aduk rata- Kerat sosis yang sudah dipotong menjadi 3 bagian- Kocok lepas telur yang sudah disiapkan- Gulung sosis dengan mie instan yang sudah direbus secukupnya, lakukan sampai selesai- Celupkan kedalam telur kocok sampai seluruh permukaannya dibalut dengan telur- Panaskan minyak lalu goreng sosis yang sudah digulung dengan mi- Tunggu sampai berubah warna atau sampai matang sambil dibolak balik, angkat tiriskan- Sajikan.

2. Bubur jagung keju.



Instagram/@snackshood

Bahan-bahan:- 200 gr beras- 1800 ml air kaldu ayam- 200 gr jagung manis pipil- 50 gr prochiz spreaady- 50 gr prochiz cheddar, parut
Cara memasak:- Masukkan beras dan air kaldu ayam masak hingga menjadi bubur- Masukan prochiz spready dan prochiz cheddar yang sudah di parut dan jagung manis pipil- Aduk hingga rata dan mengental- Angkat dan bubur jagung keju prochiz siap untuk dihidangkan.

3. Cakwe goreng udang.



Instagram/@snackshood

Bahan-bahan:- 4 buah cakwe, dipotong-potong 5 cm
Bahan Isi:- 200 gr udang kupas, dicincang kasar- 100 gr ikan tengiri, dihaluskan- 25 gr wortel, diparut halus- 1 buah cabai merah besar, dibuang bijinya, dicincang- 1 batang daun bawang, diiris halus- 2 putih telur- 1 sdt kecap ikan- 1/2 sdt garam- 1/4 sdt merica bubuk- 1 sdm tepung sagu/tapioca/kanji- 1 batang seledri, dicincang halus- minyak untuk menggoreng
Bahan saus:- 4 buah cabai merah keriting, ditumbuk kasar.
Cara memasak:- Campourkan semua bahan dan bentuk adonan sesuai selera- Goreng sampai warna kekuningan dan tiriskan- Sajikan selagi hangat.

4. Carrot cheese pure.



Instagram/@snackshood

Bahan-bahan:- 50 gr daging Sapi- 1 liter air- 1/4 siung bawang bombay, cincang- 2 siung bawang putih, cincang- 1 batang daun seledri- 200 gr wortel berukuran sedang- 50 gr ubi ungu- 1 sdm prochiz spready- 2 sdm rolled oat
Cara memasak:- Rebus air dan daging sapi, bawang bombay, bawang putih, daun seledri, rebus hingga daging empuk. Buang kotoran kaldu yang keluar lalu sisihkan. Masukan wortel dan ubi, rebus hingga matang dan sisihkan- Rebus oat meal dengan 200 gr air kaldu dan 1 sedok makan keju prochiz spready- Haluskan oatmeal yang sudah direbus, wortel, daging dan ubi ungu dengan blender dan air kaldu (50 ml). Blender semua hingga halus dan siap disajikan.

5. Sosis kentang bentuk cumi.



Cookpad/bunda hanifa

Bahan-bahan:- 8 buah sosis cham- 1 bungkus perkedelku- 1 butir telur- 100 ml air- 8 Tusukan sate- minyak untuk menggoreng
Cara membuat:- Siapkan bahan-bahan. Belah sosis 4 bagian tidak terputus. Tusuk pakai tusukan sate- Campur perkedelku dengan 100 ml air dan 1/2 butir telur. Balut sosis yang tidak dipotong dengan adonan perkedel- Celupkan pada sisa telur, kemudian pada tepung panir. Simpan pada freezer agar tepung menempel beberapa saat- Siap di goreng, panaskan minyak, kalau sudah panas masukkan sosis, dan gunakan api kecil. Siram-siram sosis agar mekar seperti kaki cumi- Siap dinikmati.

6. Bekal anak unik karakter keluarga kecilku versi ekonomis.



Cookpad/dapur lisa

Bahan-bahan:- 1 porsi- 1 1/2 centong nasi- 2 buah sosis siap saji, potong kotak-kotak kecil- 1/2 sdt cuka- 1/8 sdt garam- 1 sdt minyak sayur
Udang goreng tepung:- 4 buah udang- 2 sdm tepung terigu- 5 sdm air- 1/8 sdt kaldu bubuk- 3 sdm tepung roti
Hiasan:- 2 lembar daun selada- 1 telur dadar- secukupnya sosis- secukupnya kulit timun
Cara membuat:- 15 menit- Buat nasi kepal dengan campuran: nasi, sosis iris kotak, garam, cuka, dan minyak sayur. Aduk campur rata. Buat bulatan sebanyak 3 atau lebih juga boleh. Gunakan plastik dan sedikit minyak agar nasi tidak lengket. Sisihkan- Goreng udang: celup udang di adonan terigu, air, dan kaldu bubuk yang telah tercampur. Gulingkan di tepung roti hingga rata. Goreng di minyak panas hingga kuning ke emasan. Angkat. Sisihkan.- Ambil kotak makan hias alas dengan daun selada. Masukkan bulatan nasi kepal di atasnya. Buat mata dan mulut dari kulit mentimun. Satu bulatan nasi beri potongan telur dadar di jadikan kerudung. Hias dengan udang goreng tepung di pinggirnya dan buat bulatan sosis plus bentuk hati dari kulit timun.- Sajikan.

7. Burger mi instan.



Cookpad/Siska Afresia 'hemingway'

Bahan-bahan:- 1 bungkus mie instan, rebus- 1 sdm margarine- 2 butir telur- suwiran ayam- smoke beef, panaskan di teflon sebentar
Bahan pelengkap:- selada- timun- saos sambal dan mayones
Cara membuat:- Campurkan mi dengan bumbu mi, telur dan daun bawang. Aduk rata. Panaskan teflon lalu letakkan ring cutter dengan diameter 8 cm dan beri sedikit margarin. Setelah itu masukkan adonan mie dan masak sampai matang lalu angkat. Sisihkan
Cara Penyajian:- Ambil satu buah mi lalu letakkan selada, smoke beef, tomat dan timun. Lalu beri mayones dan saus sambal dan tutup dengan mi.

8. Oreo goreng.



Instagram/@dietmulaibesok

Bahan-bahan:- 1 pack Oreo- 1 cangkir tepung terigu- 1 cangkir susu sapi- 1 butir telur- 2 sendok makan mentega- 1 sendok teh baking powder- minyak untuk menggoreng
Cara membuat:- Masukkan Oreo ke dalam freezer selama kurang lebih 3 jam- Campur tepung dan baking powder, ayak- Masukkan telur dan susu, aduk hingga adonan larut- Masukkan mentega cair, aduk hingga rata- Celupkan oreo ke dalam adonan tepung- Goreng dalam minyak panas hingga kecoklatan- Taburi dengan gula halus

9. Bakpao buah.



Instagram/@linnaninuneno

Bahan-bahan- 500 gr tepung terigu- 1 sdt ragi instan merek Fermipan- 250 ml air hangat- 4 sdm gula halus- 2 sdm mentega putih- 1 sdt baking powder- selai cokelat atau selai buah lainnya sebagai isian
Cara membuat:- Campur gula dan Fermipan dalam setengah gelas air hangat- Diamkan 15 menit sampai berbusa- Campur terigu, mentega putih, dan baking powder. Masukkan air hangat yang sudah diberi Fermipan sedikit demi sedikit. Sembari terus mengaduk adonan hingga kalis, lalu diamkan adonan tersebut kurang lebih 45 menit- Setelah didiamkan, tinju dan bagi adonan untuk diwarnai sesuai karakter yang diinginkan- Bagi adonan menjadi 40 gr masing-masing. Bakpao harus dibentuk satu-satu terlebih dahulu sebelum diberikan isian- Setelah dibentuk, diamkan lagi 5-10 menit hingga mengembang dan siap dikukus selama 10 menit.- Kukus dalam kukusan yang telah didihkan sebelumnya. Jangan lupa melapisi kain bersih pada tutup kukusan agar tak ada tetesan air yang menetes.

10. Es krim goreng.



Instagram/@jajablogger

Bahan-bahan:- 5 lembar roti tawar biasa atau sesuai dengan jumlah scoop es krimnya- 1 sachet susu kental manis yang telah dicairkan dengan kurang lebih 50 ml air- es krim padat secukupnya- 100 gr tepung panir atau sering juga disebut dengan tepung roti.- 1 buah putih telur
Cara membuat:- Pertama, kita buat roti tawarnya agak lentur dan lembab dulu. Caranya, susu kental manis yang telah dicairkan tadi kita oleskan ke permukaan roti tawar tersebut- Lalu ambil 1 lembar roti tawar yang telah lembab, kemudian isi dengan es krim yang berbentuk bulat (caranya pakai scoop atau sendok)- Bentuk hingga seperti bulatan dengan cara menggunakan tangan, sambil dipadatkan agar tak mudah lepas- Celupkan ke dalam putih telur yang telah dikocok sebelumnya- Guling-gulingkan di atas tepung panir hingga rata. Sesekali, tekan-tekan agar rapat dan menutup semua permukaan dengan padat- Simpan dalam wadah yang tertutup rapat lalu masukkan dalam pengeras atau freezer lemari es hingga menjadi beku dan padat- Jika sudah beku, langsung goreng saja tanpa harus didiamkan dulu di suhu terbuka. Dan kamu tak perlu menggoreng langsung semua, karena jika sudah beku dalam freezer kita bisa menggorengnya kapan saja- Es krim goreng buatanmu siap disajikan. Jangan tunggu sampai dingin, saat masih panas dan renyah langsung hidangkan atau santap saja.

11. Semangka goreng.



Instagram/@apriliaresto

Bahan-bahan:- 1 buah semangka tanpa biji- 3 cangkir minyak- 1/2 cangkir maizena- 2 putih telur, kocok- 2 sendok teh air- 3/4 cangkir tepung- gula bubuk untuk garnis
Cara membuat:- Potong semangka tanpa biji hingga berbentuk persegi sekitar 2 cm- Panaskan minyak pada wajan cekung atau deep fryer- Kocok putih telur dengan tepung maizena dan air sampai tercampur rata. Masukkan potongan semangka dalam campuran ini- Gulingkan semangka pada tepung maizena sebelum memasukkannya pada penggorengan- Goreng hingga berwarna keemasan, angkat, tiriskan- Taburi dengan gula bubuk sebelum disajikan. (hati-hati semangka dapat menjadi sangat panas karena kandungan airnya tinggi).

RECOMMENDED
6 Cara membuat keripik singkong, renyah dan gurih 7 Resep dan cara membuat krim kue lembut, enak & mudah 7 Resep soto ayam kuning enak, segar dan sederhana 20 Resep makanan khas daerah, mudah dibuat 7 Resep macaroon, enak, warna-warni dan antigagal
text:
11 Unique, simple, creative and appetizing food recipes
Unique food that you can process at home.
Nov 7 2019, 14:05 by Lola Lolita
Nowadays it is very easy to find various kinds of unique foods. Being creative in cooking business, mixing new ingredients, or modifying how to cook is what then makes the culinary business world crowded with enthusiasts.
We can see how many street vendors sell unique foods with different types of flavors and colors. But relying on uniqueness alone is not enough, of course, it must be supported by delicious tastes too.
If you want to try culinary business and get your business noticed by a lot of people, you have to look for something unique. But if you just want to try to make yourself some of the unique foods you've come across, you can.
Here are some unique food recipes that you can make yourself at home, as reported by brilio.net from various sources, Thursday (7/11).

1. Sausage rolls.



Instagram / @ resepdapurr

Ingredients: - 3 pieces of beef sausage or chicken sausage, cut into 3 parts - 1 packet of instant noodles - 1 chicken egg - 1/4 teaspoon of salt - 1/4 teaspoon of tapping flavor - 1 clove of garlic, puree - 2 onions, puree - enough water to boil to taste
Complementary ingredients: - cocol sauce
How to make: - Boil instant noodles in boiling water until soft, remove the drain- After that, mix the boiled noodles with seasoning that is mashed with salt and flavoring, stirring evenly- The sausage shell that has been cut into 3 parts- Beat the loose eggs already prepared- Roll sausages with instant noodles that have been boiled to taste, do it until finished- Dip it in beaten eggs until the entire surface is covered with eggs- Heat oil and then fry sausages that have been rolled with mi- Wait until it changes color or until cooked while turning over, lift drain - Serve.

2. Cheese grits.



Instagram / @ snackshood

Ingredients: -200 gr rice-1800 ml chicken broth-200 gr sweet corn pipil-50 gr spreaady prochiz-50 gr cheddar prochiz, grated
How to cook: - Add rice and cooked chicken broth water until it becomes porridge- Put in grated prochiz and grated prochiz and sweet corn pipil- Stir until smooth and thickened- Remove and grind the prochiz cheese grits ready to be served.

3. Cakwe fried shrimp.



Instagram / @ snackshood

Ingredients: - 4 pieces cakwe, cut into 5 cm pieces
Ingredients: - 200 gr peeled shrimp, roughly chopped - 100 gr mackerel, mashed - 25 gr carrots, finely shredded - 1 large red chili, seeded, chopped - 1 stalk of chives, finely sliced - 2 egg whites - 1 teaspoon fish sauce - 1/2 teaspoon salt - 1/4 teaspoon pepper powder - 1 tablespoon sago flour / tapioca / starch - 1 stalk of celery, finely chopped - oil for frying
Ingredients: - 4 red curly chili, coarsely ground.
How to cook: - Mix all ingredients and shape the mixture according to taste - Fried until the color is yellowish and drain - Serve while warm.

4. Carrot cheese pure.



Instagram / @ snackshood

Ingredients: - 50 gr beef - 1 liter water - 1/4 clove onion, chopped - 2 cloves garlic, chopped - 1 celery stalk - 200 gr medium sized carrot - 50 gr purple yam - 1 tbsp prochiz spready - 2 tablespoons rolled oat
How to cook: - Boil water and beef, onions, garlic, celery, boil until tender meat. Discard the broth that comes out then set it aside. Add carrots and sweet potatoes, boil until cooked and set aside- Boil oat meal with 200 grams of broth and 1 tablespoon of spotted cheese prochiz- Blend boiled oatmeal, carrots, meat and purple sweet potatoes with a blender and broth (50 ml). Blend all until smooth and ready to be served.

5. Squid-shaped potato sausages.



Cookpad / Mother Hanifa

Ingredients: - 8 pieces of sausage cham - 1 packet of percedelku - 1 egg - 100 ml of water - 8 Skewers of satay - oil for frying
How to make: - Prepare ingredients. The 4-part sausage section is unbroken. Prick using skewers - Mix my cake with 100 ml of water and 1/2 egg. Sausage dressing that is not cut with batter batter - Dip it in the remaining eggs, then in a panir flour. Store in the freezer so that the flour sticks for a while- Ready to fry, heat oil, when it's hot enter sausage, and use low heat. Flush sausages so they bloom like squid legs - Ready to be enjoyed.

6. Provision of unique children's economic character version of my little family.



Lisa's cookpad / kitchen

Ingredients: - 1 serving - 1 1/2 rice ladle - 2 pieces of ready-made sausage, cut into small squares - 1/2 teaspoon vinegar - 1/8 teaspoon salt - 1 teaspoon vegetable oil
Fried shrimp prawns: - 4 shrimp - 2 tablespoons white flour - 5 tablespoons water - 1/8 teaspoon powder broth - 3 tablespoons bread flour
Garnishes: - 2 pieces of lettuce - 1 omelet - to taste sausages - to taste cucumber skin
How to make: - 15 minutes- Make rice ball with a mixture: rice, sliced sausage, salt, vinegar, and vegetable oil. Mix well. For 3 or more circles, you can. Use plastic and a little oil so that the rice is not sticky. Set aside - Fried shrimp: dip the shrimp in a mixture of flour, water, and mixed broth. Roll on bread flour until blended. Fry in hot oil until golden to golden. Lift. Set aside.- Take an ornamental lunch box with lettuce. Put the rice ball on top. Make eyes and mouth from cucumber skin. One round of rice gives an omelette cut into a veil. Garnish with flour fried shrimp on the edges and make a sausage circle plus heart shape from cucumber skin. - Serve.

7. Instant noodle burgers.



Cookpad / Siska Afresia 'hemingway'

Ingredients: - 1 packet of instant noodles, boiled - 1 tablespoon margarine - 2 eggs - shredded chicken - smoke beef, heat it on Teflon briefly
Complementary ingredients: - lettuce - cucumber - chili sauce and mayonnaise
How to make: - Mix the noodles with seasoning noodles, eggs and leeks. Stir well. Heat the Teflon then place the ring cutter with a diameter of 8 cm and add a little margarine. After that add the noodle mixture and cook until cooked then remove from heat. Set aside
How to serve: - Take one noodle and then put lettuce, smoke beef, tomatoes and cucumber. Then add mayonnaise and chili sauce and cover with noodles.

8. Fried Oreos.



Instagram / @ dietmulaibesok

Ingredients: - 1 pack Oreo - 1 cup flour - 1 cup cow's milk - 1 egg - 2 tablespoons of butter - 1 teaspoon baking powder - oil for frying
How to make: - Put Oreo in the freezer for about 3 hours- Mix flour and baking powder, sifting- Add eggs and milk, stir until the mixture is dissolved- Add melted butter, stir until smooth- Dip oreo in batter mixture- Fried in hot oil until browned- Sprinkle with refined sugar

9. Fruit buns.



Instagram / @ linnaninuneno

Ingredients - 500 gr wheat flour - 1 teaspoon instant yeast Fermipan brand - 250 ml warm water - 4 tablespoons refined sugar - 2 tablespoons white butter - 1 tsp baking powder- Chocolate jam or other fruit jams as filling
How to make: - Mix sugar and Fermipan in half a glass of warm water- Leave it for 15 minutes until foamy- Mix flour, white butter, and baking powder. Add warm water that has been given Fermipan little by little. While continuing to stir the mixture until it is smooth, then leave the mixture for about 45 minutes- After settling, boxing and for the mixture to be colored according to the desired character- Divide the dough into 40 grams each. The steamed buns must be formed one by one before giving the filling. After forming, leave it for 5-10 minutes until it expands and is ready to be steamed for 10 minutes. Don't forget to coat the clean cloth on the steaming lid so that no drops of water drip.

10. Fried ice cream.



Instagram / @ jajablogger

Ingredients: - 5 pieces of plain white bread or in accordance with the number of ice cream scoop - 1 sachet of sweetened condensed milk that has been melted with approximately 50 ml of water - sufficient solid ice cream - 100 grams of bread flour or often also called bread flour. - 1 egg white fruit
How to make: - First, we make the toast rather flexible and moist first. The trick, melted condensed milk that we have earlier smeared onto the surface of the white bread- Then take 1 sheet of moist bread that has been moist, then fill it with ice cream in a round shape (how to use scoop or spoon) - Shape it up like a sphere by using hands, while being compacted so that they do not easily escape- Dip them in whipped egg whites before rolling them on a panir flour until smooth. Every now and then, press it to close tightly and cover all surfaces. Keep it in a tightly closed container and then put it in the freezer or freezer freezer until it becomes frozen and solid. And you don't need to fry everything straight away, because if it's frozen in the freezer we can fry it anytime- Your fried ice cream is ready to be served. Do not wait until it is cold, when it is still hot and crispy, just serve or eat it.

11. Fried watermelons.



Instagram / @ apriliaresto

Ingredients: - 1 seedless watermelon - 3 cups of oil - 1/2 cup of cornstarch - 2 egg whites, beaten - 2 teaspoons of water - 3/4 cup flour - powdered sugar for garnish
How to make: - Cut the seedless watermelon into a square shape of about 2 cm - Heat the oil in a deep frying pan or deep fryer - Beat the egg whites with cornstarch and water until they are evenly mixed. Add the watermelon slices in this mixture. Roll watermelon into cornstarch before putting it in the frying pan. Fry until golden, remove, drain, sprinkle with powdered sugar before serving. (be careful watermelon can get very hot because of its high water content).

RECOMMENDED
6 Ways to make cassava chips, crispy and savory 7 Recipes and how to make soft, tasty & easy cake cream 7 Delicious yellow chicken soup sotor and simple 20 Local food recipes, easy to make 7 Macaroon recipes, delicious, colorful and antigagal
